price: Na kama wakigeuka basi Mwenyezi Mungu anawajua waharibifu.
arabic: فَإِن تَوَلَّوۡاْ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَلِيمُۢ بِٱلۡمُفۡسِدِينَ
footnotes: Wakiikataa Haki baada ya kwisha wadhihirikia, na wasiache upotovu wao, basi hao ndio waharibifu. Na Mwenyezi Mungu anawajua.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: fa-in tawallaw fa-inna al-laha ʿalīmun bil-muf'sidīna
